comment._content: Judging by the Locomotive No.23, early carriages and the quality of this image, this must be a very old photo. Marulan is on the line to Goulburn which opened in 1868. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Marulan_railway_station,_New_South_...

comment.author: 35179849@N08
comment._content: I dont think this is Marulan,.   There is no high slope in the background there.   Maybe  Muralan is somewhere else.
